isis.stitle: CAM AIR FOUNDATION BRAKES - CLEANING AND INSPECTION - CAMSHAFT BUSHINGS AND ROLLERS

svcproc.title: CAMSHAFT BUSHINGS AND ROLLERS
svcproc.para: Clean all dirt and rust from rollers and camshaft. In most cases rust will be the factor in servicing rollers. Check for dirt in splines on camshaft. Remove any small burrs from camshaft assembly to avoid damage to seals when cam is reinstalled.
Inspect camshaft, camshaft bushing or bearings and brake shoe rollers. If notice- able signs of wear exist, replace worn parts.
Do not remove camshaft bushings from spider and/or mounting bracket unless replacement is necessary.
For detailed service information, refer to GROUP 04 - BRAKES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
